data.message: Trying to report someone using Facebook to scam people.

replies.message: Hey Kristi. If you see content like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/205730929485170 Thanks for checking in with us! -Hailey

Your report mechanism is no good. I tried reporting a page which someone created to impersonate me and all I got was send a message to this person or choose not to see stuff from them. How is it going to stop them from posing as me. Putting up my stolen photos n making people believe it was me. I was harassed by this person but you people did nothing. I'm still being harassed. You need to make your system better.
